alert.note: Alert for Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 17 at 2:01PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL SAN BENITO COUNTY THROUGH 230 PM PST... At 201 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 22 miles northeast of Greenfield, or 33 miles northeast of Arroyo Seco, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central San Benito County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Park
